utterances: Wow! You seem like a great cook! Do you bake as well?
Ah not, I don't really like to bake. My wife likes to bake though and I am my like into meat meals. How about you, do you like cooking or somebody does it for you?

I've never really been much of a cook, but I'm starting to do it more and more since I've been swimming and working out. I am really trying to attack the diet aspect of getting healthy too. Got any recommendations for healthier ways to cook meats?

Yes for sure. Try to avoid fried meals and if you want to fry meat then go for beef steaks as most of other meats can cook in more healthier way. Unfortunately if you want to eat more healthier it's not bad but it's not so good as fried.
Cool, thanks for advice! Was it your mom that taught you about food and cooking? I'm find out that there's so much more to it that I never thought about.
I was attending cookery school for one year just to extend my knowledge. You're welcome, just try to avoid fats and eat more fish. Are you preparing for swimming competition?
[[blender3B:8]]
I just talked to one of my friends who works in a publishing house, and she's interested in seeing a draft of your book!
That's fantastic! How long have they been working at the publishing house?
[[blender3B:31]]
I have packed up all of my belongings and I'm ready for the flight!
I know you're excited for you trip. Are you taking your own ski equipment or are you just going to rent some there?
I'm taking my own. I'm so particular about my stuff! How has work been? I need to find some books for the trip.
I love my jobs. I'm surrounded by books all day and talk novels non stop all day with our patrons. What genres do you like to read?
I like a lot of history, nonfiction. I've always loved libraries. I would love to work in one someday. There are some amazing ones back home in Russia. Just huge!

I bet they're gorgeous. Let's see. I just read an interesting bio on Prince Charles that you might like. I'll make a list of other possibilites and will email them to you. Have you given any thought by trying snow boarding this time?
[[blender3B:46]]
I started a new quilt project and my eyes aren't tired in the least.
That's good. What type of quilt are you making?
[[blender3B:57]]
I'm working on my keto pizza and I think I found a recipe that I like. I can share with you if you want
Sure, I'd be happy to try it! I'll admit I'm skeptical, but I'm curious if it actually tastes ok. Does it taste similar to regular pizza or is it a different flavor?
[[blender3B:67]]
I have a week off of work due to spring break and i've been going to the gym alot to work on myself, what about you?
I started reading this new crime book series, and been going to the park with my dogs.
Oh nice, what is the book series called? It is great that you are going outside with your dogs! I am trying to get outside more instead of playing video games so often.
[[blender3B:70]]
Are you getting much modeling work?
Not lately. Every since I got urinary cancer I have had too many appointments taking up my time. How is your low platelets going?
Well, the medicine is for sure helping. I've been doing good, even going skydiving still on the weekends. I wish you were still into skydiving, I really miss those times!
Wow really? How do you make time to go skydiving every weekend? I wish we could plan another trip, but my health is first now a days. I do have the memories though, so thank you for all those!
[[blender3B:102]]
I just got home from my vacation in Paris. The flight home was great. It wasn't delayed, and they upgraded me to first class.

How, exciting!! How was it, I cannot wait to visit myself. I think Paris is one of the cities in the world, everyone should visit at least once. Nice, first class, you are living your best life! did you bring me anything? Were you afraid of flying by yourself? did you feel safe?
It was amazing! The sights are beautiful, the food is good, and I got to see a lot of great art. I did get some trinkets that I am going to give out. I had no problems being by myself.

I bet you had the best Latte, were they delicious? Oh the art and the statues! Thats so awesome. I am hoping I can build my own character and not be so weak. I know I can be so much more but I dont know what really is causing me to feel as though I have a broken heart? My religion has helped me lots, I think I just need to do that leap of faith and start traveling alone like you. Do you think being agnostic has helped you feel strong and self assured.

I am actually not much of a coffee drinker. I thoroughly enjoyed the food though. I am just not as reliant as religion as others. It is all about yourself and as you work on being better than you will do better.

Thats right, I forgot, you are more a tea person right? What was your favorite dish? I think because of my upbringing, religion has always been forefront. maybe thats why I want a man so much. I want a husband to take care of me. Do you feel the need to be married?
[[blender3B:105]]
Do you want to get together to watch the new Cruella movie?
I would love that! I just re-watched the trailer right before you contacted me and I am really interested in it now! I hope it's even better than the trailer.
I heard really good things about it. I am excited! When should we try to go? We could go on a weekend and make an afternoon and get some lunch. What is your favorite kind of place to go to for lunch?

I am actually free most of the week! My kids are going to a day camp and most of their evenings are with friends or the pool. I like pretty much anything, but there is a great Chinese restaurant right by Cinemaplex
that sounds great. i love chinese food! i'll take a look at my calendar and get back to you. can't wait! what kind of day camp are your kids attending?
[[blender3B:112]]
My husband took on a very high profile case. I am excited because it will be good for his business, but I am also nervous because of the media attention that will come with it.
Oh, that is both exciting and worrisome! What kind of case is it?
I am not really suppose to discus it but a very rich guy is accused of killing his maid
Oh fascinating (and sad of course)! I want to be rich enough to have a maid, but I would let him or her live. Do you think he did it?
That is all can say about the case. I am not allowed to say anymore, sorry.
It is ok. Your husband is lucky to have a partner like you. Has he ever taken on a high-profile case before? I bet the media in Nevada eats that stuff up!'
[[blender3B:121]]
I made a new dish that my daughters really enjoyed.
Really???? That is awesome!! What did you make?
[[blender3B:126]]
I decided to start my own blog site!
That's exciting! I love blogging. What do you want to blog about?
I think that I would want to blog about different people that I talk to at the mall. It could be interesting since I meet so many unique people!
That's a really different idea. I think it could work. I find people fascinating. Did you decide on a name yet?
Oh man. Maybe something funny like Mall Rats? Or maybe something like People of the Mall? What is your blog called?
Cute! I love it. Mine's called Greaner Good. It's a Vegan lifestyle blog. I review restaurants, talk recipes, and just general Vegan friendly articles.
That's such a clever name! I've thought about being vegetarian. Does your blog have any good tips?
It has tons. I started it when I decided to go Vegan, so there's a lot of good tips about starting out with a new diet/lifestyle. Why are you thinking to go vegetarian, if you don't mind me asking?
I would like to do something to help with climate change and I know that eating less meat can really help. Why did you decide to go vegan?
It was just the logical next step. I tried to avoid animal products as a vegetarian, so switching over to completely vegan made sense. It's all around better for our Earth and environment.

It definitely seems like it has gotten much easier over the years as more companies and restaurants have started to offer more vegetarian and vegan options. Do you talk about that in your restaurant review blog?
[[blender3B:136]]
I finally found a place to buy some good quality fresh seafood.
Awesome! What's the name of this place?
Uncle Petey's. Terrible name right? But the food is worth it.
LOL sometimes the worst names are the ones you can't forget! I'm guessing they're located near the coast?
Yeah. They ship it in very fast. Get's to my town 100 miles inland by the afternoon. Jealous of you being so close to the beach though
That's impressive. That means you will get the catch of the day the same day. Living close to the beach has its perks but also drawbacks
Really? What are the drawbacks? Maybe I need to rethink my dream house.
[[blender3B:142]]
I went to the Magic Kingdom at Disney World yesterday.
oh thats awesome how was your trip this year?
It was cool and even better than last year actually! I love the anime themes are you into anime and Comcon too?
yes i am, that sounds really cool maybe I can go sometime
I would recommend it especially during the week when its a lot slower. I always trip out on the roller coasters and get a little dizzy for a while afterwards.
I think rollercoasters would be my favorite i went to six flags a few years ago and had a blast
Oh fun! I love all the parks including Knotts Berry Farm! My favorite ride there is the log ride because when its hot you'll get drenched and cool off.,
where is Knotts Berry Farm?
[[blender3B:144]]
I tried baking cinnamon rolls and nearly burned my house down!
Oh no! Did your kitchen survive? No big damages I hope?
I may have been a bit over dramatic. no actual fire. but the cinnamon rolls were black. I must have misread the directions and baked them for too long.
Haha! Don't worry, even the most experienced bakers have nightmare bakes. It'll just be added experience so that you can bake beautiful things later on.
I'm honestly a little scared to try again right now. I think I need someone to help me. following videos or recipes is not my thing.
I'd love to come over and help. Doesn't hurt that I love cinnamon rolls and will do anything to get a hold of some.
that would be great. I'm free most the weekend.
I can come over Saturday afternoon. Nothing better than a lazy afternoon with yummy baking smells!
Sounds great! should we try to make any actual food while baking or just the cinnamon rolls?
[[blender3B:149]]
I accidentally fired my rifle today, I'm worried I'm going to lose my job.
Oh no, what were you doing with your rifle? Did anyone see?
[[blender3B:168]]
I just visited a restaurant here in Japan and tried some more new food.
what type of food was it?
Well it definitely wasn't sushi! I tried some fried octopus and some okonomiyaki
how was it? i've never had those foods myself.
I actually didn't really like it. I think Japanese food is not for me! I prefer French food. I had some very good French food in Paris once
I heard that there are other foods in japan. just like here in the states we have mexican, italian, jamaican food, that they have mexican, italian etc. food there...is that true?
yes, that's true, but the quality of the food can vary! japan specializes in sushi
so what part of japan were you in where you got your fried octopus and okonomiyaki?
[[blender3B:176]]
I visited my horses at the barn. I fed them and made sure they were doing alright.
I would like to ride horses again but it's been a while. Do you ever teach others to ride horses?
Not formally, but if you wanted to come out and meet my horses, I'm sure we could go on a trail ride without too much fuss. Maybe you'd even be able to take some nice pictures of them!
That would be amazing! I love to photograph animals. I take pictures of the cats that I house sit all the time.
Aw, that must be so cute. Do you show them to the cat's owners? I'm sure they'd love that!
[[blender3B:196]]
Are you ready for the Slayer Show next week?
Yeah I really need a release. I've been holding on the a lot of guilt after hitting that dog.
Did you find out whether the dog was ok in the end, or was it bad? I was so upset when you told me about it, it made me want to become a vet even more!
Luckily the dog is ok, but I got rid of my car anyway. I decided to get a slower car. I'm sure you hugged your dog tighter after I told you about the accident.
that's great, did it do a lot of damage to the car?! I alwasy hug my dog the tightest i can without him popping!
No my car was fine. But it was also good to get a cheaper car. I do work at Burger King after all. Are you looking in to vet schools?

Fair enough - if you're going slower you'll be less likely to hit any more dogs! Do you get free burgers from work? Yeah i'm looking at a few at the moment, but they all seem to be so far away from home :(
I do get free burgers. It might be a fun adventure to leave home. I can't wait to escape from my hometown. You have your dog who will always be with you.

Oh wow i'd be so fat if i got free burgers! Do you burn all the calories at your metal gigs? Yeah it might be fun, and it might be a necessity, it's just building up the courage to move away from my family :(
[[blender3B:197]]
I have gone to New York city like you suggested.
Nice! I've been before many times and think it's an awesome place. What have you been getting up to?
I went down on broadway and watched a film. What are good things to do in New York?

Very nice. That's definitely a must-do activity. What film did you see? I recommend the Giant Lotus Bar if you're passing by the area. Their food is surprisingly cheap and the staff are all so lovely. It's Italian-inspired, which your favourite I believe.
I went to see a The Lady and the Tramp and When Harry met Sally, it was a double feature matinee. I do love Italian food and it would be great to get a New York slice. Do they serve pizza?
Wow, that's great. I saw The Lady and the Tramp when I was in New York last year! They certainly do serve pizza - all kinds, in fact. What is your favourite type?
I like cheese pizza with a big glass of water. I get heartburn. That said when I am in Chicago, I get a big Chicago slice with everything on top. Do you like pizza?

I'm sorry to hear that. But they definitely have cheese pizza! And they'll accommodate you with a big glass of water; they're great like that! I do like pizza, and one of my favourite toppings is pineapple. What do you think of pineapple on pizza? I know a lot of people think it's awful!

I actually love pineapple on pizza, something unique about the sweet flavor in combination with the cheese oils just hits the spot. The consistency of it is not to thick or firm so it's not overbearing against the texture of the bread and cheese which are quite soft. Not to overpowering on flavor which is why like strawberry makes no sense, but pineapple is perfect.
Wow, I couldn't have put it better myself! I'm glad I've found another pineapple-pizza fan; we seem to be in a minority here, friend. Did your parents come with you to New York?
[[blender3B:275]]
We're having a get togther for your sendoff tommrorow. Please come!
That's so sweet! What sort of things are planned for the sendoff?
[[blender3B:285]]
My aunt has some bad allergies, so I called her for some advice for you.
What all is she alergic to? Have you tried any medications yet or removing what she is alergic too from her house?
[[blender3B:292]]
How was the visit with your parents? What did you do with your dogs while you were gone?

It was nice. I enjoy visit my parents. I like to have some quality time with them. About the dogs, I was lucky that my neighbour's son was free and I asked him to look after them. What do you usually do with your dogs when you go somewhere?
I board them with the vet so I don't have to worry about anything happening to them.
Do you pay when you leave them with the vet?
Yes, it does cost more than I would spend if I had friends to watch them, but I like the security. Do you pay your neighbor's son or does he watch your dogs for fun?
[[blender3B:293]]
I listened to Charlie Parker the other day and that singer is growing on me. I also had some awesome grape jello yesterday!
That sounds like a pretty good day! Some jazz can really brighten up anyone's day. Is grape jello your favorite flavor?
[[blender3B:302]]
You know, I am enjoying to work inside! I got that job!
That's great news! Was it the IT job? I was hoping you'd get it.
Yes I did!! Thank you for your encouragement! How is your work going?
Oh, it's about the same, pays the bills. I decided to start an herb garden this year, along with my vegetable garden. Are you going to start a garden this year or have you given up on that idea?

I'm still getting used to the structure of this new job, especially after going so long unemployed. I definitely asked about flexibility with the schedule, and if I could start later in the day so I'd have time to garden first like you suggested. Since I'm the newest hire, I think they are a little stricter on scheduling and whatnot, but hopefully as I gain experience and benefits, I'll have more flexibility there. That's awesome about the herb garden! What kind of herbs are you thinking about?

Basil, some mints, rosemary, cilantro and thyme to start. Mints are easy to grow, no way you could kill those haha. But you have to keep them under control or they'll take over. You might want to start with those. And I'm sure you'll settle into the routine of working soon.
I'll definitely keep that in mind!! Have you been busy with anything else outside of gardening? Any more organized events for women's rights coming up?

Yes I'm working on putting together a fundraiser. With all that's going on in the southern states right now it's important to keep busy on the issue. Don't go buying lottery tickets with your increased salary, now. I know how you like to gamble. Have a little fun but put some in savings.
I'll definitely put some in savings? What kind of fundraiser? Are you going to sell some of your veggies? You can count me in to donate some funds, now that I've got a job!
[[blender3B:308]]
Lady found another snake on the farm yesterday. We may need another German Shepherd just for the snakes.
Oh wow, but do you know why type of snake it is? Maybe they are harmless.

Yes I'm sure they are harmless but don't want to take any chances. Our German Shepherds do a great job at scaring them away but could use another because they seem to be appearing more and more on our farm.
Interesting. Maybe they are breeding on the farm somewhere. Do you have any sheds or dark places?

Yes we have many sheds that we have farm equipment in so that is a possibility. So how long have you had your parrot? Farm animals are totally different then having a parrot. I bet the parrot makes for entertainment.
We've had him for about 2 years. He is good fun most of the time but can be quite noisy. Sometimes he talks when we try to sleep.
Ah I bet that is a bit annoying! But I bet your family enjoys the parrot. Have you had a scary experience with horses? Is that why you don't like them?
I just feel like they are so much bigger than me! They could kick me on accident and that's the end. You don't have any problem with them?
[[blender3B:311]]
Have you been skateboarding lately or were you with your girlfriend?
I haven't been with her today but I have been skateboarding for days now.
Aw, that's too bad. When are you going to see her again?
We having a movie night tomorrow. Have you any sweet poet I can read to her please write one for me
Oh that's nice. What movie will you watch? Here is a poem. "Roses are Red. Violets are Blue. Sugar is sweet, but not as sweet as you."
[[blender3B:360]]
I'd like to tell you about a new car deal that I have at my shop.
Oh wow, I'd love to hear it! What is the car deal? What kind of cars is the deal on?
[[blender3B:369]]
I met an awesome guy during my shift at the gas station today!
That's awesome! Is he a regular?
I'm not sure. I've only been working this job for a month or so, so I don't know how often he frequents the place.
What made him so awesome?
[[blender3B:371]]
I've been looking at an old Ford's engine.
Oh yeah? Are you fixing it for someone? Or are you into cars?
[[blender3B:377]]
What date does your 4 week break end on?
Oh that ends on Friday, then I go back to work on Saturday. We start filming a new TV show that day
Did you go anywhere during your break?
Not really, it was just nice to spend time with family back in my hometown. It's nice to get away from the city. Do you like the small town life?
Yes and no. My hometown was really small. Only 12 people lived there. You could blink and miss the whole town. How many people lived in your small town?
12? wow that is small! There was 500 in mine. It's quiet and nice to get away from the hustle and bustle. How is the search for a job going? Do you have anything you really want to land for work?
[[blender3B:395]]
I have been researching ways to get my farm back!
Have you found anything helpful yet? I have friends in Thailand who own a couple of farms - they might be able to help!
[[blender3B:400]]
What parts of Europe did you visit?
We went to Germany! Think it was some place called Berlin? Sure were a lot of people there!
Oh wow, I love Berlin. Did you have a good time? What did you get up to while you were there?

It was fun! Really crowded though. I wish Abigail could have come with us. We mostly just walked around and looked at stuff! My parents took lots of pictures. Did you take any pictures from when you went to Paris?
Yeah, it's a beautiful place. I got some really good footage for me YouTube channel too. You would love it there. They have a Disney Land too!
Oh boy! I've always wanted to go there. You should go and take a video so I can watch it!
I actually did. I'll let your parents know me YouTube channel and then you can check it out. Have you and Abigail been on holiday together before?
Thanks! I can't wait to watch it. We went camping together with our parents but that was forever ago! I hope we can do something soon, but I'm always so busy with martial arts class.
How's that going? You'll be a young master by now. Do you go to any competitions or do you just do it for fun?
[[blender3B:405]]
I went to Bellissimo Italia, it was amazing, thank you
Amazing. What were your highlights?

How interactive the chef was, I never attended an Italian restaurant where the meal is cooked in front of you. I have attended habachi's but this is different, I learn so much from Italian dishes and how dishes were put together. Have you decided what location you are going to vacation?
That sounds great. What did you order? Not yet, but this talk about Italian food, maybe Italy?

I order piccata chicken with penne pesto pasta! it was different different and bold flavors. That would be awesome! I would love to see Florence in person! in pictures and on TV looks so ethereal, Greece too! have you been to Greece before?

That sounds so yummy. I hope you ended the meal with something sweet. Florence sounds great but I'd like to check out all the sights in Rome. Greece sounds interesting too. I think it's very hot there like the weather in Iraq when I was there.

You wont believe this, but I dont really like desserts! I dont know why, I am definitely a savory person, you? Oh yes! can you image being right now in Rome, the weather, the people, the culture, give it to me! How is Iraq? is it a pretty place in person or is it like the way its seen on pictures
[[blender3B:409]]
How were the pictures you took when it was snowing?
They were absolutely stunning. The morning sun made for a gorgeous snowy sunrise. Do you ever plan on coming to New York? I can definitely photograph your portrait!

I have always wanted to visit New York but this year we're planning a trip to Texas to visit the country music hall of fame. Did you use any editing software with your pictures? I've always wanted to try it.
Wow! I am originally from Texas but moved to New York to pursue my photography career. I haven't been able to use my editing software yet because my cat chewed my charger!
I didn't know you were from Texas. It seems like New York would be a big change, do you miss it? Any must sees while we are there?

It was definitely a big move. I miss the weather and the food. I haven't found good BBQ like back home. You just gotta keep an eye out for everything being oversized! Texans do it big haha. Where are you from?
I'm from Florida originally but we moved to Washington about five years ago. Best decision ever - we get so much rain here and a day trip to the beach is never to far way.
Oh wow, whereabouts in Florida? I love going to Aventura at least once or twice a year. I have never been to Washington. I could imagine my hair not agreeing with all that rain!
[[blender3B:410]]
I joined the science club today! I also went on a walk with Maddie after school.
Wow how exciting! How was walking with Maddie?
[[blender3B:426]]
I've heard they're making a new Stephen King adaptation - I bet I end up going to see it!
Yeah, I am trying to get in on that one! I want to be in one of his movies because they are bomb!

So cool. Where I live they filmed the Shawshank Redemption. I know some people who were doubles in it. I love horror but true crime is my favorite thing to read. What kind of books have you read so far this year? Any you recommend?

Oh yeah. I read this one book called The Butterfly Garden by Dot Huchinson. It was very dark and disturbing, but it was true crime/fiction. And it is still haunting me. It is a book in her collectors series. I have not yet been able to get myself to read the others in that series because it hit me pretty hard.
Wow. That sounds like something I would really love. I just finished a book myself this morning about a serial killer. Do you read your books through Kindle? Or check them out from the library?

I have kindle unlimited and the libby app, but I believe that particular one was on Kindle Unlimited. It was about teenaged girls being kidnapped and locked in a giant jar and turned into butterflies permanently after the man and his son had their way with them. So I had to lay off her books for a bit. Oh! I also read Billy Straight. that was on libby from my library. It is AMAZING. and it is a true crime story! What was the book you read?

I have never heard of the Libby app. I'll have to check that out. I use Kindle because I have Amazon Prime and there are a ton of free books to find that way. The book I read was called Fatal Charm. It was about a husband who murdered two of his wives staging it to look like accidents each time. I hope to find another similar one to read next. What was Billy Straight about?
[[blender3B:427]]
I listened to rap music and ate hamburgers while we spoke.
Oh wow! I don't know anything much about music, of course... I know that there are different forms of rap, though. Is yours angry rap, dirty rap, political rap, or what?
It's basically any kind of rap there is, I love it all! Was going to ask you, have you read any good books lately?

I'm actually re-reading an old favorite just now. A Russian novel by Doystoyevsky. I'm reading a different translation this time - it's surprising how different the different translations can be. It makes you realize how much the translator has to do! Are you reading lately?

Oh that sounds interesting! Yes, I've been reading a book about numbers. That's kind of what I do now that I'm retired. In the book it explains what favorite numbers mean, I found out that my favorite number, 62, actually means that I am a calm person and I like to relax, which is true. I read about your favorite number too, number 7 means friendly and sure of themself which is definately you!
Do I come across as sure of myself? I'm glad to hear that - I often don't feel that way. Is the book you're reading something like numerology? I don't really know what that is... Is it like astology?

It's not really like astrology, but it is close I guess because numbers in a way are aligned like the stars! I find all of that interesting. Too bad you don't know how to drive, you could come over and I could show you the book.

Oh, that would be fun. I can always take an Uber, but I'm not sure we're that close to each other. Maybe you can come over here some time. Now that you're retired, do you find yourself bored, or is it easy to fill your time?
[[blender3B:429]]
I read a really good book last week. I wanted to know if you had read it.
Sure, you know how much I love reading. What was the name of the book?
The book is called Children of the Corn. As a farmer the title really stood out to me, but it's actually a really scary book.
Yes, it is a scary book. I have read it and, actually, enjoyed it. Not sure I would have read it though if I was a farmer like you. Haha. How is the farm these days?
Glad you enjoyed the book. The farm is doing well, thanks for asking. I have been selling some of my produce at the local farmers' market. Sales are better than I expected.

That is great! I would love to visit the farmers market but I only eat Kosher foods. Maybe we can meet up one day and you can show me how the tractor works. I have a movie coming up and the actor whose stunt double I am will be playing a farmer.
Showing you the tractor would be fun, especially with this new movie. I'd like to hear more about it, how is your work as a stunt double going lately?
[[blender3B:431]]
I spoke to my sister, she would like a kitten.
Is she looking for a specific breed? Would she be interested in more than one?
Yes, actually. She is specifically looking for a Siamese. And potentially a breeding pair. Is that something you could offer?
Not that type specifically but I do know some one that has pure breeds and might have what you are looking for. Does your sister have a price range that she would like to stay in?
Yes, she can really only afford probably $300-500 for each kitten at the very most. Do you think you could work with a budget like that?
I will have to check, that is midrange so there is a strong possibility that he works within that price point. If not are there any other breeds your sister will consider?
I know she did express some interest in the Persian breeds as well, do you have any of those?
He does have those but I am afraid those are too expensive for how much your sister is willing to spend. He does have some Oriental Shorthair's that would be at the top of her range but doable.
I'm afraid I'm more of a dog person, so I'm not really familiar with that breed. I would really have to get in touch with her and see what her thoughts are, if that is alright?
Absolutely. Let me contact him and get a list together with all of his available breeds and their pricing. Then your sister can look it over and decide.
Thanks, that would be great. I appreciate it. What can you tell me about the Oriental Shorthair that I could relay to her in the meantime?
[[blender3B:439]]
I have decided where to put the artwork I bought from you.
That's terrific! Where did you end up putting it?
[[blender3B:448]]
When is your next road trip?
My next road trip is going to be to Florida, so i can visit my family. Do you travel often?
That sounds like fun! Where in Florida do they live? I don't travel terribly often, only for an occasional vacation.
[[blender3B:451]]
How is your business doing?, I see you love to travel maybe we can hang out in florida some day and take a trip to some of the wonderful beaches over here
